code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AliceBazzocchi(){const navigate=useNavigate();const username="AliceBazzocchi";const[savedUser,setSavedUser]=useState("");const[level,setLevel]=useState(0);const QestAns=[{Question:"riunisciti con il tuo “compagno” e capite come presentarvi VELOCEMENTE.
